        Create a new metadata object.

    • Method Detail

      • addMetaData

        public static byte[] addMetaData(byte[] encodedValue,
                                 AddCacheRequest<?> request)
        Encodes extra metadata needed about this entry into the start of the byte array given to the backing store.
        Parameters:
        encodedValue - the encoded cache value object
        request - the cache request
        Returns:
        a new byte array containing metadata

      • populateMetaData

        public static void populateMetaData(SimpleCacheObject remoteRetrieve)
        Populates the cache metadata for the given entry. This will replace the value array and the metadata object inside the cache object.
        Parameters:
        remoteRetrieve - the cache object from the backing store
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalStateException - if the metadata is already populated in remoteRetrieve, or if no cache value is present

      • setWasRetrievedLocally

        public CacheMetadata setWasRetrievedLocally(boolean wasRetrievedLocally)
        Sets the flag for whether the associated entry has been locally retrieved.
        Parameters:
        wasRetrievedLocally - how was the most recent retrieval done
        Returns:
        this object

      • wasRetrievedLocally

        public boolean wasRetrievedLocally()
        Returns:
        true if this entry was retrieved from a local cache

      • canBeRetrievedLocally

        public boolean canBeRetrievedLocally()
        Returns:
        true if this entry can be stored locally
